description: Loads files from a git repository. Uses raw git protocols, so this is not a GitHub specific implementation.

url.description: URL for source repository. Will be templated with envars.
url.title: Url

branch.description: Branch, ref, or commit to load files from.
branch.title: Branch

pattern.description: Blob pattern(s) of files to include.
pattern.title: Pattern

exclude.description: Blob pattern(s) of files to exclude. Calculated after pattern (ei, files from pattern are selected, then any matching exclude are removed).
exclude.title: Exclude

title: GitLoader
